name: Bonsi
description:
Bonsi is a quick and fast paced game, with space physics, shop system, high scores ,unlockables and more!

It features an easy to learn system with path prediction,trails, lightning  and more!

All sprites are made with basic shapes which further simplifies the game.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Click and drag to launch the player.

You die if your timer runs out, you hit a green enemy, or you fall in lava.

Yellow enemies reset your timer and give you new launches.

Have fun and beat my high score of 38 with the star!
